name: Where's My Brother?
description:
The Shift stole everything from you. 

Ever since that day—the day you stepped into the Orb—you care only about one thing: finding your brother. In this world—a world of elves and magic and creatures unseen by human eyes—you are alone. After years of pointless searching, you come across someone who tells you she can help. Determined not to trust her, but with no other leads, you set on a journey with your ally, hoping that she can lead you to what you’ve lost.

The choices you make will help you see your brother again. Make the wrong ones, and he will be lost to you forever.
